data.title: European Parliament
data.meta_description: Main page of the European Parliament's Committee on Economic and Monetary Affairs (ECON). Latest news, links to documents and videos of meetings.
data.text: The constitutive meetings of the European Parliament's standing committees and subcommittees will take place in Brussels on 23 July 2024, following the appointments of their members in the plenary sitting of 16-19 July. During the constitutive meetings, each committee and subcommittee will elect its respective bureau, made up of a Chair and Vice-Chairs, for a two-and-a-half year mandate. The newly set up committees will then start holding their regular meetings during the same week following their constitutive meeting.
